                 int plPosY,
                 Player pl,

                 sample.MapScene prevScene)
        Parameters:
        plPosX - X position of a player
        plPosY - Y position of a player
        pl - player object
        pacbot - the aim of a bot if emulation is chosen
        primary - primary stage from Main class
        prevScene - main menu scene
